description: Starts a Synchronous Express state machine execution. StartSyncExecution is not available for STANDARD workflows.

parameters.name: stateMachineArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the state machine to execute.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: The string that contains the JSON input data for the execution, for example: "input": "{\"first_name\" : \"test\"}" Length constraints apply to the payload size, and are expressed as bytes in UTF-8 encoding.

nested_items.name: executionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the execution.

nested_items.name: stateMachineArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the state machine.

nested_items.name: startDate
nested_items.description: The date the execution is started.

nested_items.name: stopDate
nested_items.description: If the execution has already ended, the date the execution stopped.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the execution.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: The error code of the failure.

nested_items.name: cause
nested_items.description: A more detailed explanation of the cause of the failure.

nested_items.name: input
nested_items.description: The string that contains the JSON input data of the execution. Length constraints apply to the payload size, and are expressed as bytes in UTF-8 encoding.

nested_items.name: inputDetails
nested_items.description: Provides details about execution input or output.

nested_items.name: included
nested_items.description: Indicates whether input or output was included in the response. Always true for API calls.

nested_items.name: output
nested_items.description: The JSON output data of the execution. Length constraints apply to the payload size, and are expressed as bytes in UTF-8 encoding.

nested_items.name: outputDetails
nested_items.description: Provides details about execution input or output.

nested_items.name: included
nested_items.description: Indicates whether input or output was included in the response. Always true for API calls.

nested_items.name: traceHeader
nested_items.description: The X-Ray trace header that was passed to the execution.

nested_items.name: billingDetails
nested_items.description: An object that describes workflow billing details, including billed duration and memory use.

nested_items.name: billedMemoryUsedInMB
nested_items.description: Billed memory consumption of your workflow, in MB.

nested_items.name: billedDurationInMilliseconds
nested_items.description: Billed duration of your workflow, in milliseconds.
